rooms.name: Garage_Entrance
rooms.description: Designated space for two-car garage and entryway, with a secure door and ample lighting in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest_Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming area featuring traditional Chettinad motifs, open space layout, and Vastu-aligned entrance. It connects to both the lounge and kitchen.

rooms.name: Lounge_Dining
rooms.description: Open-plan living and dining area with flexible seating arrangements, natural light, and traditional Chettinad decor. Features include a Vastu-aligned central hearth for positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed with modern appliances integrated into the traditional aesthetic. The layout is optimized following Vastu principles to avoid negative energies.

rooms.name: Utility_Space
rooms.description: A designated area for storage and home-office space. It is designed keeping in mind the efficient use of limited ground floor space.

openings.name: Main_Entry
openings.description: Large entry door with glass accents that allow natural light to pour in. Vastu-aligned placement ensures a welcoming energy.

openings.name: Garage_Door
openings.description: Double doors providing access from the driveway to the garage and lobby. Designed for ease of access while maintaining security.

openings.name: Balcony_Window
openings.description: Small window overlooking the entrance area that provides additional natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu recommendations.
